sequence:
Émile, the Dancing Angel

<size=45>Chapter 3 - Hidden Talent</size>

scripts.say: Commander, I need to borrow Émile from you again, nya!
... For the third time this week? Really?

options.content: Ask Akashi what she needs her for

scripts.say: My sales for this month have miraculously increased thanks to Émile helping out at my shop, nya!
Huh? How is that thanks to me?
Because you're a nice person, nya! You're an angel, nya! You're always helping everybody out, nya!
Really...? But the last time I substituted for you, all I did was show Shiratsuyu around, looked after Terror on Erebus' behalf...
... gave advice to some friends of mine, and showed off some of my dance performances. I'm pretty sure that's all I did.
That's exactly it, nya! You're helping everyone out, nya! And they show their gratitude by shopping at my store, nya!
D-do they...? I'll always help a friend in need, that's all it is. I don't do it so that they'll feel indebted to me...
That is because you are always able to discern what it is a person wants, and you know how to help them with it in a capable manner.
It sounds quite embarrassing when you describe it like that~
Please, you need not be so humble. I, too, am indebted to you.
Nya?! Where the heck did you come from, nya?! If you came to try to steal Émile from me then get lost, nya!
Bah... In any event, Émile's talent to sell products is undeniable. She need only see our recent increases in sales to understand her influence...
Indeed, one could call her very presence therapeutic. Even I felt as though I may ascend to the heavens when observing her, even from afar...
Please, I'm not THAT amazing! Still, if you think my contributions matter so much, then how about I watch both of your stores for a while? Would that be okay, Commander?
I guess I should go check on her later when she's shopkeeping.
